subdialogue_text: Ahh, who's there?
Is someone there, anyone?
Ahh, please, whoever you are, touch me.
The dark surrounds me, nibbles at my flesh.
Little creatures, they never stop biting.
So please, hold out your hand, and touch me...
Ahh, yes, there you are, so close, indeed.
Then I am not entirely alone, just yet.
Praise the merciful gods above...
Oh, forgive me.
I am Irina of Carim.
I came to this land so that I might be a Fire Keeper.

Your touch has freed me from the darkness.
You are a Champion, then?
I am weak, and unfit to tend the flames,

But if it would not trouble you,
might I enter into your service, instead?
Ahh, yes, of course, I understand.
Even so, I thank you deeply. For your touch.
I will never forget it, not ever.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Decline" to either the 2nd or 3rd query
subdialogue_text: Oh, sweet Champion. You still wish to converse?

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Decline" to either the 2nd or 3rd query
subdialogue_text: Don't worry about me. I've long dealt in dark. It is my calling.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Decline" to either the 2nd or 3rd query
#0Choose "Accept her service" to either the 2nd or 3rd query
subdialogue_text: Oh, thank you, sweet Champion.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her service" to either the 2nd or 3rd query
subdialogue_text: I shall take my vows.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her service" to either the 2nd or 3rd query
subdialogue_text: I, Irina of Carim, solemnly swear to serve you.
Have mercy!
Please, stop this!
Ohh, great gods, forgive me...
Oh, Champion of Ash. Welcome back.

I was not meant to be a Fire Keeper,
but I am honoured to serve you beside the Bonfire.

The gods are ever-merciful.
My gratitude lies with them, and with you.
I am yours now. Your wish is my command.
Oh, Champion of Ash. Welcome back.
Do you wish to hear a tale? You only have to ask.
You know, in my home of Carim, I was a nun.
I would be pleased to share the tales of miracles with you.
Although to be honest, I only know a few.
But if I had a divine tome, I could tell you many tales and more.
Ahh, only I cannot see...
Terribly sorry, but you'll have to find me a Divine Tome in braille.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Braille Tome of Carim / Lothric"
subdialogue_text: Ahh, you've brought me a braille Divine Tome.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Braille Tome of Carim / Lothric"
subdialogue_text: Now I can tell new tales of miracles.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Braille Tome of Carim / Lothric"
subdialogue_text: Tales of the greater miracles can be quite the epics...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Braille Tome of Carim / Lothric"
subdialogue_text: What fun we will have.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Braille Tome of Carim / Lothric"

subdialogue_text: Have a pleasant journey, Champion of Ash.
I pray for your safety.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, purchased all Miracles
subdialogue_text: Thank you ever so much, sweet Champion.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, purchased all Miracles
subdialogue_text: May your solemn duty conclude in triumph.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after offering all Cinders
subdialogue_text: Godspeed, Champion of Ash.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after offering all Cinders
subdialogue_text: May your solemn duty conclude in triumph.
Have mercy, please!
Please, stop this, sweet Champion!
What have you done, sweet Champion of Ash...
I only wanted to...

subdialogue_text: Oh, what's this...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Deep / Londor Braille Divine Tome"
subdialogue_text: Champion of Ash, this Divine Tome is forbidden...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Deep / Londor Braille Divine Tome"
subdialogue_text:
These are dark tales of things that lurk deep within men...
These stories would not please you...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Deep / Londor Braille Divine Tome"
subdialogue_text: Of course, if you insist, I will read them for you.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Deep / Londor Braille Divine Tome"
subdialogue_text: Only, ahh, ahh, they frighten me so.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Give Divine Tome" & "Deep / Londor Braille Divine Tome"
subdialogue_text: The little creatures that nibble at me in the darkness...
Ahh, ahh, sweet Champion. Where have you been?
Please, your touch...
The little creatures, how they nip and bite...
